languages.text: "Я бы сказал, что вашей династии стоило избавиться от нее раньше лет на десять. А если бы вы прождали еще пару лет, то делать это уже пришлось бы мне. Небрежность со временем может быть роковой, {name}".
"I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Я бы сказал, что вашей династии стоило избавиться от нее раньше лет на десять. А если бы вы прождали еще пару лет, то делать это уже пришлось бы мне. Небрежность со временем может быть роковой, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "I would say your house should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."
"I would say your house should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."
"I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."
"I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."
"I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は10年早くヴィステンツァを見限るべきだったな。私ならそうした。怠慢が、最終的には破滅を招くのだよ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は10年早くヴィステンツァを見限るべきだったな。私ならそうした。怠慢が、最終的には破滅を招くのだよ、{name}」

languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, ."

languages.text: “要我说，你的王朝本该在十年前就抛弃她了。若是再等两年，恐怕就得轮到我亲自动手了。玩忽职守可能酿成滔天大祸，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “要我说，你的王朝本该在十年前就抛弃她了。若是再等两年，恐怕就得轮到我亲自动手了。玩忽职守可能酿成滔天大祸，{name}。”

languages.text: «En mi opinión, su dinastía debería haberse deshecho de ella hace unos diez años. De haber tardado dos más, tendría que haber intervenido personalmente. La negligencia puede terminar siendo letal, {name}».
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «En mi opinión, su dinastía debería haberse deshecho de ella hace unos diez años. De haber tardado dos más, tendría que haber intervenido personalmente. La negligencia puede terminar siendo letal, {name}».

languages.text: « Je dirais que votre dynastie aurait dû se débarrasser d'elle il y a au moins dix ans. Sachez que si vous aviez attendu ne serait-ce que deux ans de plus, j'aurais moi-même pris les choses en main. La négligence peut avoir des conséquences fatales, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Je dirais que votre dynastie aurait dû se débarrasser d'elle il y a au moins dix ans. Sachez que si vous aviez attendu ne serait-ce que deux ans de plus, j'aurais moi-même pris les choses en main. La négligence peut avoir des conséquences fatales, {name}. »

languages.text: "Ich würde sagen, das hätte Eure Dynastie schon gut zehn Jahre früher machen sollen. Und hättet ihr noch zwei Jahre gewartet, hätte ich es selbst erledigen müssen. Nachlässigkeit kann irgendwann tödlich werden, {name}."
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde sagen, das hätte Eure Dynastie schon gut zehn Jahre früher machen sollen. Und hättet ihr noch zwei Jahre gewartet, hätte ich es selbst erledigen müssen. Nachlässigkeit kann irgendwann tödlich werden, {name}."

languages.text: "Bana sorarsan hanedanlığının ondan on yıl önce kurtulması gerekirdi. Bir iki yıl da sen bekleyecek olsan icabına kendim bakardım. İhmalkârlık, zaman içinde ölümcül sonuçlar doğurabilir {name}."
languages.original_text: "I would say your dynasty should have discarded her a good ten years earlier. And had you waited another two, I would have had to do it myself. Negligence can eventually become fatal, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Hanedanlığının ondan on yıl önce kurtulması gerekirdi bana sorarsan. Üstüne iki yıl da sen bekledin. İcabına kendim bakmam gerekirdi. İhmalkârlık zaman içinde ölümcül sonuçlar doğurabilir {name}."
